posts.message:
Hi guys,

We are looking for local guide in every corner of the global. No matter who you are a student, an office worker, a housewife, etc if you have passion in travel, want to share your beautiful city where you're living with international friends and earn more money. Do not hesitate to sign up and become our tour guide. It's completely free

iTravelLocal, an exciting social web platform that connects travellers with locals from all over the world. You don't need to have a deep knowledge about the country history or the famous tourist destination in your country. You can self organize a tour around your neighborhood or where you would like to eat and play everyday

This is an ideal oppotunity for anybody who want to improve language, make friend with people on the whole world and increase income when you have free time. Click here to become a local guide: http://bit.ly/Become-a-localguide

[[[-ONETRIP RECRUITMENT-]]]

Hi Admin, we really appreciate a lot if this can be accepted by you on this group for this recruitment.
***
Dear friends,

My name is Duc Nguyen, I am a part of Onetrip Motorcycle Adventure Tour.
Onetrip.vn & Facebook.com/Onetrip.vn (for more photos and videos) and we are listed on TripAdvisor as Onetrip Motorcycle Adventure.

Onetrip is looking for more freelance motorbike drivers/guides/licensed guides who love traveling by motorbike, and getting off the beaten path.

Experience with manual transmission motorbikes as well as high English proficiency, are the two basic requirements; but motorbike driving skills can be trained by Onetrip team.
Our guides are people who love meeting new people and learning about new cultures; while simultaneously showing them the beautiful side of Vietnam. You don’t need to be a professional tour guide to join Onetrip, you just need to be friendly and passionate. We're not in the business of providing a tour, we are in the business of creating awesome adventures! 

Onetrip currently provides awesome adventures to Cu Chi, Mekong, Can Gio and around Ho Chi Minh City. We welcome anybody who have ideas for more awesome adventures to help us provide more awesome experiences for guests.

Send your CV to the mail: talent@onetrip.vn
For further information please contact me via the number here: 096 3015277 (Duc Nguyen)

Cheers,
Team Onetrip

***
Onetrip Adventure Tour RECRUITMENT
****
Dear friends,
My name is Duc Nguyen, I am a part of Onetrip Adventure Tour.
www.Onetrip.vn & Facebook.com/Onetrip.vn (for more photos and videos)
Onetrip is looking for freelance motorbike drivers/guides/licensed guides who love traveling by motorbike, and getting off the beaten path.
Experience with manual transmission motorbikes as well as high English proficiency, are the two basic requirements; but motorbike driving skills can be trained by Onetrip team.
Our guides are people who love meeting new people and learning about new cultures; while simultaneously showing them the beautiful side of Vietnam. You don’t need to be a professional tour guide to join Onetrip, you just need to be friendly and passionate. We're not in the business of providing a tour, we are in the business of creating awesome adventures! 
Onetrip currently provides awesome adventures to Cu Chi, Mekong, Can Gio and around Ho Chi Minh City. We welcome anybody who have ideas for more awesome adventures to help us provide more awesome experiences for guests.
Please send your Cover Letter and CV to Email: [[[talent@onetrip.vn]]]
****
For further information please contact me via:
Phone: 01689.210.410/0934.652.210
Cheers,
Duc Nguyen

RECRUITMENT
****
Dear friends,

My name is Duc Nguyen, I am a part of Onetrip Adventure Tour.
Onetrip.vn & Facebook.com/Onetrip.vn (for more photos and videos)

Onetrip is looking for freelance motorbike drivers/guides/licensed guides who love traveling by motorbike, and getting off the beaten path.
Experience with manual transmission motorbikes as well as high English proficiency, are the two basic requirements; but motorbike driving skills can be trained by Onetrip team.
Our guides are people who love meeting new people and learning about new cultures; while simultaneously showing them the beautiful side of Vietnam. You don’t need to be a professional tour guide to join Onetrip, you just need to be friendly and passionate. We're not in the business of providing a tour, we are in the business of creating awesome adventures! 
Onetrip currently provides awesome adventures to Cu Chi, Mekong, Can Gio and around Ho Chi Minh City. We welcome anybody who have ideas for more awesome adventures to help us provide more awesome experiences for guests.

For further information please contact me via:
Email: duc@onetrip.vn (please attach CV if possible)
Phone: 01689.210.410/0934.652.210

Cheers,
Duc Nguyen

posts.message:
BÃªn mÃ¬nh lÃ  cÃ´ng ty du lá»‹ch trá»¥ sá»Ÿ á»Ÿ Sapa, cÃ³ nhu cáº§u tuyá»ƒn dá»¥ng hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n viÃªn Ä‘Ã£ cÃ³ báº±ng quá»‘c táº¿. 

Position: Tour Director 
The exciting position we have available is that of tour director. The chosen candidate will be responsible for logistics, confirmations, planning, customer care, transportation and group dynamics. They will also brief guests on local history and culture. There will also be opportunities to guide small groups in both trekking and on motorbike tours. As a tourist guide you would:
• Accompany groups on day tours and multi day tours to a number of interesting places or sites.
• You would escort groups around the site or area, and give information about its history, culture, traditions or other points of interest.
Guided tours could include sightseeing tours, trekking tours, themed walks and mountain biking trips. You could also work as a driver guide taking small groups of tourists on guided tours around places of interest by motorbike.
Requirements:
• Possession of a valid, international tourism licence*
• Willingness to relocate to Sapa
• Excellent spoken and written English. 
• A love of Vietnam and its cultural heritage 
• A full Vietnamese motorbike licence. 
*An international tourism licence is essential. Successful applicant will receive on-the-job training from the ETHOS management team.
About ETHOS
ETHOS are small, specialist, tour organiser that operate as a Social Enterprise. Social enterprises are businesses that trade to tackle social problems, improve communities, people's life chances, or the environment. ETHOS make money as a social enterprise from selling traditional handicrafts and via tourism services. ETHOS provides well-designed tours that connect travellers to Sapa and its people, creating authentic, unforgettable travel experiences. We provide tours for people of varying ages and fitness levels that want to experience Sapa within a range comfort zones. We practice sustainable and responsible tourism, and therefore ETHOS appeals to the ethically conscious traveller.
Interests and qualities:
To be a tour director you should have:
• an interest in working with people
• excellent communication skills, and an ability to present information in an interesting way 
• good organisational skills for planning tours and the ability to manage your time effectively
• an awareness of health and safety issues
• competent skills with Microsoft excel and word 
Wages and benefits:
Wages: Please enquire for details.
Benefits: Accommodation and two meals a day are included with the position. 
Working hours and conditions: Work is for 6 days a week. 14 days of paid holidays per year, excluding national holidays. Tourist guiding is often seasonal work, so your working hours will vary. You are likely to work at weekends and sometimes in the evening.
Experience: Preferable but not essential 
For more information, please submit a resume and covering letter to ethosspiritsapa@gmail.com

ETHOS - Spirit of the Community Job Vacancy 

Position: Tour Director 

The exciting position we have available is that of tour director. The chosen candidate will be responsible for logistics, confirmations, planning, customer care, transportation and group dynamics. They will also brief guests on local history and culture. There will also be opportunities to guide small groups in both trekking and on motorbike tours. As a tourist guide you would:
• Accompany groups on day tours and multi day tours to a number of interesting places or sites.
• You would escort groups around the site or area, and give information about its history, culture, traditions or other points of interest.
Guided tours could include sightseeing tours, trekking tours, themed walks and mountain biking trips. You could also work as a driver guide taking small groups of tourists on guided tours around places of interest by motorbike.
Requirements:
• Possession of a valid, international tourism licence*
• Willingness to relocate to Sapa
• Excellent spoken and written English. 
• A love of Vietnam and its cultural heritage 
• A full Vietnamese motorbike licence. 
*An international tourism licence is essential. Successful applicant will receive on-the-job training from the ETHOS management team.
About ETHOS
ETHOS are small, specialist, tour organiser that operate as a Social Enterprise. Social enterprises are businesses that trade to tackle social problems, improve communities, people's life chances, or the environment. ETHOS make money as a social enterprise from selling traditional handicrafts and via tourism services. ETHOS provides well-designed tours that connect travellers to Sapa and its people, creating authentic, unforgettable travel experiences. We provide tours for people of varying ages and fitness levels that want to experience Sapa within a range comfort zones. We practice sustainable and responsible tourism, and therefore ETHOS appeals to the ethically conscious traveller.
Interests and qualities:
To be a tour director you should have:
• an interest in working with people
• excellent communication skills, and an ability to present information in an interesting way 
• good organisational skills for planning tours and the ability to manage your time effectively
• an awareness of health and safety issues
• competent skills with Microsoft excel and word 
Wages and benefits:
Wages: Please enquire for details.
Benefits: Accommodation and two meals a day are included with the position. 
Working hours and conditions: Work is for 6 days a week. 14 days of paid holidays per year, excluding national holidays. Tourist guiding is often seasonal work, so your working hours will vary. You are likely to work at weekends and sometimes in the evening.
Experience: Preferable but not essential 
*Based on a sales rate of one standard tour sold per day.
For more information, please submit a resume and covering letter to ethosspiritsapa@gmail.com

Thank you and have a nice day.

Chao ca nha, hien minh dang lam cho cong ty ve  nha hang,bar va cafe tren toa nha bitexco ( tang 50,51 va 52).Minh dang can cong tac vien ,chi can ban gioi thieu luong khach toi su dung dich vu ben cong ty cua minh,ban se huong duoc 10% tren tong hoa don ma khach cua ban su dung .Cong viec nay, khong ton nhieu thoi gian va cong suc.Ban khong phai bo von de dau tu ,nhung ban co the kiem them thu nhap ben canh muc luong ban dang co.Cang nhieu khach,ban se kiem thu nhap cang nhieu.Hy vong se duoc cung duoc hop tac voi cac ban.

Dieu kien : khong can kinh nghiem,chi can ban co moi quan he rong va se la loi the neu ban la huong dan vien du lich.

Thac mac gi lien he voi minh nhe,minh ten la Bich 097 944 2612

Ca nha oi cho minh dang thong tin ve cong viec nay voi. Co ai co nguoi quen co the lam thi tag giup minh voi nhe^^

Minh quen mot Giao su Han Quoc sap di cong tac tai Hue va can mot thong dich tieng Anh voi cac yeu cau sau:

+ Gioi tieng Anh 

+ Hieu ro ve Hue 

+ Cham chi, can than (vi se phai cung voi giao su ghi chep cac so lieu dieu tra)

Chi tiet ve cong viec:

+Dia diem lam viec: Noi thanh thanh pho Hue

+ Thoi gian lam viec: tu 18~22/8/2014 ( 18,19: lam viec ca ngay; 20~22: lam buoi sang hoac buoi chieu)
 
+ Noi dung cong viec: Cung Giao su va cac thanh vien di xung quanh Thanh Pho Hue de tien hanh Dieu tra hien truong (lien quan den cac van de ve giao thong)

Mong nhan duoc su quan tam cua cac ban. Ban nao co quan tam thi pm cho minh nhe (va thong bao giup minh muc phi thong dich)

Cam on va chuc ca nha mot ngay thanh cong!^^

Dear Chinese people,
In the past, China has been invaded by other countries, so Chinese people also feel the pain and the loss when a foreign country was invaded.
I am a child of Vietnam. Certainly you can understand my feelings when our sovereignty is infringed by your army.
China has been invaded by other countries, so Chinese people also feel the pain and the loss when a foreign country was invaded.
Our nation has experienced many struggles with your country and other empires. We had lost so much. Therefore, we want to live in peace, friendship and cooperation. We always hope that our both countries will follow the desire and achievements that were gained by a great effort of President Ho Chi Minh and President Mao Zedong as well as the predecessors of the two countries. We hope that our country will follow the slogan about friendship that President Ho Chi Minh said, “We are comrades as well as brothers”, as the lyrics of composer Do Nhuan’s song, Vietnam – China: “Vietnam – China, joined by mountains, joined by rivers, sharing Eastern Sea, an friendship, early like the dawn.”
I am sure that you also want to live in peace, we do too. War is painful and death. War causes countless families to be in afflictive situations. Our wounds due to wars haven’t been healed. We don’t want to suffer that great pain once more time.
However, if that happens, all Vietnamese people are willing to sacrifice once more time to protect our freedom and independence. Our 90 million people are ready to protect our country together.
Dear peoples of the world – those who love peace,
China is violating Vietnam’s sovereignty. They are violating Vietnam’s law as well as UNCLOS 1982 and the United Nations Charter. Therefore, we look forwards to your help to protect our country.
Dear all of Vietnamese,
Because of peace, we have to compromise. But if China is still aggressive, I call for all of Vietnamese to stand up to protect our Vietnam.
We are ready for a Dien Bien Phu on the sea. Anything can be ignored but sovereigty and national jurisdiction could not be violated.
Long live Vietnam! Long live Ho Chi Minh! Long live Vo Nguyen Giap!

HTM is a professional boutique hospitality and tourism management consultancy, operating in Vietnam, Laos and Cambodia since 1998. We have successfully conducted feasibility studies, tourism master plans, hotel and resort openings, cruise ship, travel agent, restaurant, bar and various other projects in the region. Over years, HTM has gained an excellent reputation within the industry and developed into one of the leading hospitality and tourism management consultancies in Vietnam.

Please see below our request for candidates’ CV in base Lao Cai, Sapa, Ha Giang

For an international tourism training project to be carried out in Vietnam from November 2012 to December 2013, the HTM Management Consultancy is urgently looking for experienced and qualified freelance tourism trainers to provide vocational trainings for local Home-stay Operators, Tour Guides and Transport Service Providers in Lao Cai, Ha Giang, Hue and Hoi An.

Principal requirements:
•	Proven experience delivering and organizing vocational trainings in the tourism sector
•	Sound understanding of the tourism and education sectors
•	Trainers have recognized qualification/s in nominated field/s of training is highly desirable
•	Trainers have a number of years of experience working in the industry of nominated field/s is
•	Availability as freelance/ part-time trainer during project implementation 
The daily rate for trainers is 900,000 VND 1,200,000 net

Interested parties submit their CV in Word please to sales@ht-management.com
